feature.name: Keen Smell
feature.shortDescription: The bear has advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.description: The bear makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.description: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.description: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.
